projects.title: Biosynth
projects.description: Project BioSynth was started in 2008 with an aim to design, commission, operate & troubleshoot an on-campus 200 litre batch scale Biodiesel production facility with a budget of INR 5 million, and was completely managed by students. I was in the Research & Development Team.â€¢ Tested various materials and modified processes to optimize biodiesel outputâ€¢ Created the standard protocol for biodiesel production adopted in 4th year laboratory curriculumâ€¢ Established a pilot plant on campus which successfully produced commercial grade biodiesel
